description: In Morocco and Tunisia, sweet potatoes are often cooked in tagines, with herbs and spices, and served as a side dish or salad. The combination of green olives and preserved lemon is typically Moroccan.
name: Sweet Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 25g fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
500g sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-sized cubes
1 preserved lemon, peel only, finely chopped
1 bunch small flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a tagine pot or heavy-based pan. Stir in the onion and cook for 1-2 minutes, until it begins to colour. Add the cumin and ginger, and fry until fragrant.

Toss in the sweet potatoes along with the paprika and pour in cold enough water to just cover the base of the pot. Cover and cook gently for 10-12 minutes, until tender but firm, and the liquid has reduced.
Season to taste and add the olives, lemon, and lemon juice. Cover and cook for a further 5 minutes to let the flavors combine.
Stir in half the herbs and transfer the mixture to a serving dish. Garnish with the rest of the herbs and serve warm or at room temperature.
